title: Ben Carson thinks the Earth exploded during the Big Bang.
subtitle: While Carson doesn't believe the theory of the origin of the Big Bang because we do, the virus Mimi misunderstands Carson's point of view on this subject.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Ben Carson once said, "If the Big Bang is just a theory, if by chance it's true, how do you explain that the ground didn't explode during the explosion?"
